summary: This test module validates the behavior of AWS Batch compute environment management operations—creation, deletion, description, and updates—for both managed and unmanaged configurations, covering EC2 and Fargate types, using mocked AWS services.
business_intent: Ensure that the application correctly interacts with AWS Batch APIs to provision, modify, and clean up compute environments, handling required parameters, error conditions, and IAM role updates, thereby guaranteeing reliable batch processing infrastructure.
